attributes.action: Stop jihadis fighters for Isis get priority houses and back in the UK
attributes.additional_details: It's all over the new the government with give Jihadi Fighters coming back to the UK priority housing. They are terrorist and should not be aloud back in to the UK. To give in to them is given in to terrorists and will make us a soft target for more attack
attributes.background: homeless pepole on the street. The government will not help and 1 in 9 of these homeless people are over brave solders who keep us safe and do the job the government send them to do. to give Jihadi Fighters houses to not attack us is wrong they are terrorists and should not be allowed back in the UK
